about_the_game: Increase the madness and show off with Riders Republic™ Year 1 Pass and receive eight exotic kits unlocking throughout the year, starting with the Rocket Bike and Rocket Skis Day 1. The Year 1 Pass also includes the BMX Sport add-on coming to Riders Republic after launch. Plus, enjoy seven days of early access to all exotic kits and the BMX Sport.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (4GB) / AMD RX 470 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows Compatible Mouse & Keyboard. Online conneciton required. Controller highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD Radeon RX 570 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows Compatible Mouse & Keyboard. Onmline Connection required. Controller highly recommended
